001package com.technototes.vision.hardware;
002
003import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCameraFactory;
004import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvInternalCamera;
005
006import com.technototes.library.hardware.DummyDevice;
007
008@SuppressWarnings("unused")
009public class InternalCamera extends Camera<OpenCvInternalCamera, DummyDevice<OpenCvInternalCamera.CameraDirection>> {
010
011    public InternalCamera() {
012        this(OpenCvInternalCamera.CameraDirection.FRONT);
013    }
014
015    public InternalCamera(OpenCvInternalCamera.CameraDirection dir) {
016        super(new DummyDevice<>(dir));
017        createCamera();
018    }
019
020    public OpenCvInternalCamera.CameraDirection getCameraDirection() {
021        return getDevice().get();
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public OpenCvInternalCamera createCamera() {
026        return OpenCvCameraFactory.getInstance()
027                .createInternalCamera(
028                        getCameraDirection(),
029                        hardwareMap
030                                .appContext
031                                .getResources()
032                                .getIdentifier("cameraMonitorViewId", "id", hardwareMap.appContext.getPackageName()));
033    }
034}
